AzureBlade: So, mystery bot, will you stay calm and answer our 
questions? I am certain collaboration would be a lot less painful.

His blue head was now calmer than it was a few instants before. He 
crossed his arms, the two extended jet wings on them almost touching. 
He looked to the bot with an angry stare. He was definitely not happy 
of having been stabbed by a knife. His wound was more mental than 
physical, yet he took it very personnal.

AzureBlade: Speak now, or you may perish silent.
